question:
Consider the following statements about Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojana (DDUGJY):
  1. The scheme focuses to provide separate feeders for agricultural and rural household consumption
  2. The scheme includes metering of distribution transformers and feeders
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Both are correct statementsThe scheme focuses on feeder separation (rural households & agricultural) and strengthening of sub-transmission & distribution infrastructure including metering at all levels in rural areas. The scheme includes metering of distribution transformers/feeders/consumers.
